Class Ir

java.lang.Object
  com.quanta.hcbiapi.Ir

public class Ir
extends java.lang.Object

Class to control IR MCU

          Fan speed for air conditioner

          Received keys from TouchLife TLT-SRC3200 remote controller
static class Ir.Temp
          Temperature for air conditioner
 
Constructor Summary
Ir(Context context, Handler rxHandler, int flags)
          Create connection to IR MCU and open database Definition for "flags" variable NOTE: Un-used bits are DONT-CAREs BIT[4] Stop bit size: 0=>1bit, 1=>2bits BIT[3~2] Parity check: 00=>None, 01=>Odd, 10/11=> Even BIT[1~0] Data size: 00=>8bits, 01=>7bits, 10=>6bits, 11=>5bits

Constructor Detail

Ir

public Ir(Context context,
          Handler rxHandler,
          int flags)
   throws java.io.IOException
Create connection to IR MCU and open database Definition for "flags" variable NOTE: Un-used bits are DONT-CAREs BIT[4] Stop bit size: 0=>1bit, 1=>2bits BIT[3~2] Parity check: 00=>None, 01=>Odd, 10/11=> Even BIT[1~0] Data size: 00=>8bits, 01=>7bits, 10=>6bits, 11=>5bits

Parameters:
context - the application context
rxHandler - while receiving a key, this class will send a message to rxHandler. The Message.obj contains RxKey object
flags - configure serial port.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if fail to establish the connection to IR MCU or fail to open database
Method Detail

read

protected int read(byte[] buf)
            throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException

pause

public void pause()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException
Stop IR MCU. MCU operations are halted until start() is called.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

resume

public void resume()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException
Start IR MCU. MCU operations are resumed to Rx mode.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

getID

public byte[] getID()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Get the ID of IR MCU. Block until the ID is returned.

Returns:
byte array of the IR MCU ID. The max bytes are 16 bytes.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

learnShort

public boolean learnShort(int keyID)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Learning a key from A/V remote controller and store it in /sdcard/learned_key.txt. Block until the key is learned or time out (15 seconds).

Parameters:
keyID - the key number to store the learning result.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

learnLong

public boolean learnLong(int keyID)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Learning a key from AC remote controller and store it in /sdcard/learned_key.txt. Block until the key is learned or time out (15 seconds).

Parameters:
keyID - the key number to store the learning result.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

txLearn

public boolean txLearn(Ir.Port port,
                       int keyID)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
Send a learned key. Block until the ack is received.

Parameters:
port - the Tx port.
keyID - the key number of learned key to send (match the key parameter of learnShort/learnLong function).
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

txRawData

public boolean txRawData(Ir.Port port,
                         byte[] keyData)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
Send a key using the provided raw data. Block until the ack is received.

Parameters:
port - the Tx port.
raw - data for the key.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the connection to IR MCU is broken.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

getBrandAV

public java.lang.String[] getBrandAV()
Get all A/V device brands names in database.

Returns:
String[] of A/V brands names

getBrandAC

public java.lang.String[] getBrandAC()
Get all air conditioner brands names in database.

Returns:
String[] of air conditioner brands names

getCodeListAV

public java.lang.String[] getCodeListAV(java.lang.String brand)
Get a list of code number for a brand of A/V device. Each code number map to a set of Keys (POWER, VOL+, VOL-,...). A code number may be used by multiple A/V device with the same brand.

Parameters:
brand - specify which brand of code list to get
Returns:
String[]. Each String represent a code number

getCodeListAC

public java.lang.String[] getCodeListAC(java.lang.String brand)
Get a list of code number for a brand of air conditioner. Each code number map to a set of air conditioner states. A code number may be used by multiple air conditioner with the same brand.

Parameters:
brand - specify which brand of code list to get
Returns:
String[]. Each String represent a code number

txAV

public boolean txAV(Ir.Port port,
                    java.lang.String codeNum,
                    Ir.Key key)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Send a key of an A/V device in database to a IR Tx port

Parameters:
port - the IR Tx port
codeNum - the code number to be selected in database
key - the key to be sent
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if fail to access the tty device
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

txAC

public boolean txAC(Ir.Port port,
                    java.lang.String codeNum,
                    Ir.Power power,
                    Ir.Mode mode,
                    Ir.Temp temp,
                    Ir.Fan fan)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Send a state of an air conditioner in database to a IR Tx port.

Parameters:
port - the IR Tx port
codeNum - the code number to be selected in database
power - the power state. Mode, temp, and fan will be ignored if power is set to off
mode - the operation mode. Temp and fan will be ignored if mode is AUTO or DRY. Temp will be ignored if mode is FAN
temp - the temperature
fan - the fan speed
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if fail to access the tty device
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep is interrupted.

close

public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Close serial port. !!!IMPORTANT!!! :: MUST REMEMBER TO CLOSE

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If failed to close serial port.
